about.suggestion_content1: If you have a feature idea or are experiencing an issue:
about.suggestion_content2: I want this tool to be as good as possible, if anything annoys you when using it, I want to know!
about.api_content1: If you're a developper you can interface with Twitchat.
about.api_content2: Twitchat API uses OBS-Websocket as a communication channel.
about.credits_sites: Check out some of my other works:

bingo.goal_emote: Find one of the global Twitch emotes

error.irc_reconect: Authentication failed. Refreshing token and trying again...
error.authorization_refused: You refused access to the Twitch application.
error.csrf_failed: An error occured while generating a CSRF token
error.obs_ws_connect: Unable to connect with OBS. Double check the port and password and make sure you have OBS 28+ or OBS 27 with OBS-websocket plugin (v5)
error.twitch_poll_delete: An error occurred while deleting the poll
error.twitch_prediction_delete: An error occurred while deleting the prediction
error.auto_shoutout: You have not been raided yet
error.commercial_start: An error occured whens tarting the commercial:{DETAILS}
error.user_profile: Something went wrong while loading user's profile...

moderation_action.mod: {USER} has been added to your mods
moderation_action.modded_by: {USER} has been added to your mods by {MODERATOR}
moderation_action.unmodded: {USER} has been removed from your mods
moderation_action.unmodded_by: {USER} has been removed from your mods by {MODERATOR}
moderation_action.viped_by: {USER} has been added to VIPs by {MODERATOR}
moderation_action.unviped: {USER} has been removed from your VIPs
moderation_action.unviped_by: {USER} has been removed from your VIPs by {MODERATOR}
moderation_action.commercial_start: A commercial just started for {DURATION} seconds

commercial_start_confirm.title: Start a commercial?
commercial_start_confirm.description: The commercial break will last {DURATION}s. It's not guaranteed that a commercial actually starts.

twitch_scopes.moderator:read:chat_settings: Read room settings  (follow only, sub only, etc...)
twitch_scopes.moderator:manage:chat_settings: Update room settings (follow only, sub only, etc...)

home.head: Twitchat is a full featured, free and open source chat alternative for streamers

list.title: Emergency button
list.description: Protect yourself from doxxing, hate raids and follow bot raids with the simple click of a configurable button

list.title: Pin messages
list.description: Pin any message and find them back in a dedicated list

list.title: Stream Deck‚Ñ¢
list.description: You can pause the chat, scroll it, mark messages as read, open poll/prediction/bingo/raffle state and much more with the push of a button

list.title: Spoiler command
list.description:
Messages starting with || will be shown as spoilers.
Your mods will be able to set another user's message as spoiler by responding to it with the !spoiler command

list.title: Search messages
list.description: Quickly search for messages containing any word with the <mark>/search</mark> command

list.title: Alert command
list.description: Let your moderator get your attention with a configurable alert command

list.title: Voice control
list.description: Control the chat, create polls and predictions and much more with your voice thanks to the voice bot

list.title: Read messages out loud
list.description: You can make Twitchat read any messages the way you want

list.title: Greet your viewers
list.description: Twitchat remembers the first message of every viewer so you don't forget to greet them

list.title: Read mark
list.description: Click any message so you remember where you stopped reading at

list.title: Conversations
list.description: Follow conversation between viewers with the simple click of a button

list.title: Create a Raffle
list.description: Let your viewers enter a raffle and pick one or multiple random winners

list.title: Create a Bingo
list.description: Let your viewers guess a random number or emote

list.title: Create your own alerts
list.description: Twitchat provides a Trigger system to control OBS, send messages on chat or control Spotify based on many events like a sub, cheers, a poll result, channel points rewards, ...

list.title: Spotify & Deezer
list.description: Connect Twitchat with Spotify or Deezer to display the current track on your stream or allow your viewers to add tracks to the queue

list.title: Twitchat also allows you to
items: Receive whispers on chat and respond to them
See users not following you
Display your viewers' pronouns
Display BTTV, FFZ and 7TV emotes
Hide messages sent from your bots
See who's live amongst your followings to raid them
Send a shoutout with a simple click
Automatically see last stream info of a raider
Know when users enter/leave your chat
Replace badges by minified plain color versions
And much more...

footer.title: Sources on
footer.disclaimer: Twitchat is NOT affiliated with Twitch by any means

login.closedBeta: Beta is closed to a few people sorry :)
login.head: Twitchat aims to fill gaps from the official Twitch chat for the streamers
login.update_title1: An update needs these new permissions
login.update_title2: An update needs this new permission

permissions.head1: Twitchat needs these permissions to offer you as much Twitch features as possible.
permissions.head2: Your authentication token will never be stored on our server.

logout.title: You are now logged out.
logout.details_head: Other apps won't tell you but logging out is not enough.
logout.details_1: Twitchat app still, theoretically, has access to your account.
logout.details_2: You may want to also revoke access to the app from your Twitch account.
logout.details_3: Scroll down to the Other Connections section, find TwichatApp entry and click Disconnect button.

music.deezer_interact: Deezer needs you to click here to be able to play music.
music.spotify_play: Spotify requires you to first play some music before trying to use it from Twitchat
music.spotify_refused: You refused to grant access to your Spotify account

obs.how_to_title: Where can i find these values?
obs.how_to1: On OBS, open to "Tools => obs-websocket Settings".
obs.how_to2: You'll probably want to leave the IP to
obs.ip_advice: You may want to set the IP to 127.0.0.1 instead of what OBS shows you

params.firstMessage: Show the first message of every viewer on a seperate list so you don't forget to say hello
params.markAsRead: Click a message to remember where you stopped reading
params.conversationsEnabled:
Group conversations
(allows to display conversations between users seperately)
params.userHistoryEnabled: See all user's messages when hovering their name
params.groupIdenticalMessage:
Group identical messages of a user
(sending the exact same message less than 30s later brings it back to bottom and increments a counter on it)
params.offlineEmoteOnly: Set chat on emote-only when not live
params.stopStreamOnRaid: Cut OBS stream after a raid
params.ad_info: The following message will be posted on your chat every 2 hours (if you received at least 100 messages)
params.ad_disable_info1: To disable this ad, make any donation :)
params.ad_disable_info2: Please specify your twitch profile on your donation details when possible so I can disable ads for your account. Or DM me on Twitch, Discord (Durss#9864) or Twitter
params.ad_bot_info_title: Can this message be sent by nightbot / wizebot / ... ?
params.ad_bot_info_content:
Yes

By default the message is posted with your account.
But you can configure any other bot to send that message if you wish.

Twitchat won't send the message as long as a message containing twitchat.fr is sent on the chat by anyone at least every 2h.

botMessages.raffleStart: /announce üéâüéâüéâ Raffle has started üéâüéâüéâ Use {CMD} command to enter!
botMessages.shoutout: /announce Go checkout {USER} {URL} . Their last stream title was "{TITLE}" in category "{CATEGORY}".
botMessages.twitchatAd: /announcepurple Are you a Twitch streamer? I'm using GivePLZ twitchat.fr TakeNRG, a full featured chat alternative for streamers. Take a look at it if you wish KomodoHype

commands.timerAdd: Add time to the current timer
commands.timerRemove: Remove time from the current timer
commands.countdownAdd: Add time to the current countdown
commands.countdownRemove: Remove time from the current countdown
commands.search: Search for a message by its content
commands.tts: Start reading the messages of a user
commands.ttsoff: Stop reading the messages of a user
commands.betaadd: Add a user to the beta-testers
commands.betadel: Remove a user from the beta-testers

chat.title: Chat
chat.description: Randomly pick someone amongst users that sent a chat command

subs.title: Subs
subs.description: Randomly pick someone amongst all your current subscribers

list.title: list
list.description: Set a custom list of entries and randomly pick one
list.instructions: (Seperate entries with a coma or a line break)

legal.title: Legal concerns
contents: Depending on your country's legislation, making your viewers win something while using the "sub" ponderation option or randomly picking a winner amongst your subs might be illegal.
You may want to check this out before doing a giveaway.

configs.title: Configs
configs.timer_overlay_add: on your OBS scenes to display the remaining time on your stream

delete_confirm.title: Close raffle
delete_confirm.description: All raffle entries will be lost

params.ponderate: Ponderate votes (additional points given for every matching criteria)
params.ponderate_include_gifter: Include sub gifters (user not sub but that subgifted someone else)
params.ponderate_exclude_gifted: Excluded sub gifted users (user that only got subgifted)

head: Twitchat took MONTHS of my personnal time to create.
It's free for you to use but it costs me money, and I like eating (vegy) food.
If you can afford it, feel free to thank me and make my day brighter with one of the options bellow!
sponsor.important_content1: Specify your Twitch login on your donation message when possible or send me in a whisper on Twitch so I know which twitch user you are !
sponsor.important_content2: This is necessary if you want to have the ability to disable the automatic message :)

stream.form_custom_tags_warn: Custom tags are not yet allowed by Twitch API

voice.global_commands: These are the words you'll have to say to navigate through forms
voice.fill_global: Fill in all global commands above

remote.title: This page allows you to control Twitchat and some twitch features with your voice
remote.install: In order to work, this needs
remote.commands: Create your voice commands on Twitchat under Parameters => Voice control section

commands.GREET_FEED_READ_ALL: Mark all "Greet them" messages as read
commands.CHAT_FEED_READ_ALL: Mark all chat messages as read

home.head: Twitchat est une alternative gratuite et open-source au chat de Twitch pour streamers
